system.description:
You must be holding a talisman or other inspiring item in one hand. When you perform the Give Order action with those conditions, you can alternatively select the following stunts:

  • Inspiring Aura: All allies within Near range who can see you, gain a +1 modifier on one simple skill of your choosing until the start of your next turn. An ally can only use this bonus on one roll.
  • Empowering Presence: You increase the range of your Inspiring Aura stunt to Short range until the start of your next turn.
